doc.field: LIBERTY.SAY, What is Freedom? What the right of soulsWhich all who know are bound to keep, or die,And who knows not, is dead? In vain ye pryIn musty archives, or retentive scrolls,Charters and statues, constitutions, rolls,And remnants of the old world's history:&These show what has been, not what ought to be,Or teach at best how wiser Time controulsMan's futile purposes. As vain the searchOf restless factions, who, in lawless will,Fix the foundations of a creedless church&A lawless rule&an anarchy of ill:But what is Freedom? Rightly understood,A unviersal license to be good.
